entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
